nodes.text: Shaala Doneeta was a female Rutian Twi'lek.
Doneeta was a personal aide of Count Dooku who wore Sith-like tattoos on her lekku. She accompanied him when he made his Fete Day speech.

Shaala Doneeta was based on a Force adept originally created by Bryan K. Borgman for a Star Wars RPG home game in early 2000. The character was introduced into canon via her appearance in the CIS Shadowfeed in Star Wars Insider 72.
